OOC: Yes I choose "monks" because I want them to
resemble Tibetian monks but they wouldn't discriminate
(may I suggest the name "Nun").

--- black_ben14 <black_ben14@...> wrote:
> ooc:Female bot can be in the Monks?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > Gracius: We are the Cybertronian Order of Monks. 
> We
> > seek only peace.  We will obey whatever
> regulations
> > your masters require of us, but this is the planet
> to
> > which the Matrix has guided us.  We promise not to
> > disturb history in a negative way.
> > 
> > Gracius waits for Cheetah to begin the
> transformation
> > of the ship to a base for the landing.
> >

> > > OOC:I know you'll land anyways, I'm just playing
